text: 13:15 Luk 4:16; Aposel 13:27; 15:21; Hibru 13:22Ezɨ God ko mɨgeir dɨpenimɨn garir gumazir dapanir ekiaba, me Moses Osirizir Araziba ko Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazibar akaba dar bora me mɨgei. Me dar ponegha gɨvagha, Pol ko Barnabas bagha akam amaga ghaze, “Aveghbuaba, ia akurvazir mɨgɨrɨgɨatam gumazir kabav kɨmsɨ, ia me mɨkɨm.”
